post:
Hi everyone!

I am a long time lurker here when it still had the balls haha and on the 2 other green forums.

I am still learning and have hosted sites for some locally in an individual capacity. But when the pandemic happened I thought why not start this web hosting thing since I was thinking of doing it for some time now.
